thread.title: Search on for missing plane
thread.title_full: Search on for missing plane | News24

author: news24.com
title: Search on for missing plane
text:
Cape Town - A search for a light aircraft that went missing between Wonderboom Airport and Middelburg in Mpumalanga was underway on Saturday.
Air Traffic Navigation Services spokesperson Percy Morokane confirmed that an aircraft was reported missing, and said a search and rescue operation had been activated.
Further details were not immediately available, but earlier Twitter's @crimeairnetwork said the craft was a Beechcraft Bonanza.
